amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-466 to strike sections 401, 402, 403, and 407.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike sections of the bill that increase the President's drawdown authority to send defense articles overseas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spartz amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 319 (Roll no. 147).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Spartz amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 319 (Roll no. 147).
